column1: Little Goat Diner////On yelp a lot of people recommended the french toast with crispy chicken and it was good!! It had an egg inside the bread which broke open while eating the french toast
column2: which blew my mind. The bread was really fluffy and super soft. After all the amazing things I heard about Little Goat
column3: I dont know if the food lived up to my expectations
column4: but it was definitely good. We did have to wait for quite on awhile
column6: on a Wednesday at 6 pm. Also the dish I ordered was $16
column7: which is fine because it's probably a harder dish to make
